messages.subject: Needing direction? Read Todd's links
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to steer anyone who is looking for some guidance or direction on Unschooling, read through the Homeschooling links on Todd s web site.  I just
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to steer anyone who is looking for some guidance or direction on Unschooling, read through the Homeschooling links on Todd's web site. I just read through the first four(although I've read through 2 before) and I am re-energized.

I think it is so easy to fall away from the simpleness that unschooling is. And it is so helpfull to read others opinions and thoughts. I especially relate to the first article in this link, Protest, Gonna do some printing out, that is OK right?

Thanks Todd! And I'm back to reading!

Kelli
